result.reason: Issue body is empty; copy/paste between local and remote is typically an RDP clipboard/drive redirection configuration setting — need reproduction steps and whether RedirectClipboard/RedirectDiskDrives are enabled in the connection properties
result.approach: If confirmed as a bug, verify that RedirectClipboard and RedirectDiskDrives properties are correctly forwarded to the MSTSC ActiveX control; likely a config/documentation issue rather than a code bug
